Coordinate

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Coordinate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Coordinate[] MapData.getCoins()
      Gets all of the coins on the map.
      Coordinate Player.getCoord()
      Gets the coordinate of the player.
      Coordinate Edge.getKey()
      Gets the first coordinate which connects the edge.
      Coordinate Edge.getValue()
      Gets the second coordinate which connects the edge.
      Coordinate[] Game.updatePlayer(Player p)
      Updates the specified player and tells the other players that this player has updated.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Coordinate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Game.boundsDetection(Coordinate player)
      Checks if the player is on any edge.
      boolean Coordinate.collideArea(Coordinate a, Coordinate b, int radius)
      Calculates if two coordinates collide which eachother if both have a specified radius.
      boolean Game.collisionDetection(Coordinate a, Coordinate b)
      Checks if two coordinates collides with each other.
      double Coordinate.distanceTo(Coordinate c)
      Calculates the distance between the current coordinate and the specified coordinate.
      double Coordinate.distanceToM(Coordinate c)
      Calculates the distance between the current coordinate and the specified coordinate in meters.
      Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Coordinate 
      Constructor and Description
      Edge(Coordinate a, Coordinate b)
      Creates a new edge which is connected by the two coordinates.
